title: Umbrella
summaries: The Umbrella is a held item, and on [img:Desktop version] Desktop, [img:Console version] Console, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile, a melee weapon as well. It can be found in surface Chests and in Wooden Crates. It can also be purchased for 1 from the Skeleton Merchant during a Waning Gibbous.

When held, the Umbrella appears above the character and allows the player to fall at a slower rate. It replicates the effect of the <linked>Featherfall Potion</linked> and prevents <linked>fall damage</linked>.
Its best modifier is Legendary.

statistics.Damage: 10 (Melee)
statistics.Tooltip: You will fall slower while holding this
